short_summary: Job Title: Head of Organizational and Cultural Transformation
duration_in_months: It's unclear from the announcement but a three-year term is implied.
full_summary:
### [Title]
### RFP for Organizational and Cultural Transformation Services

### Reference Number and Solicitation Number
MX-42857491945, PS23-AG-017

### Purpose
Farm Credit Canada (FCC) invites interested and qualified service providers to submit their proposals for providing organizational and cultural transformation services. The selected service provider will contribute to the revitalize FCC’s culture, review its organizational structure, and develop a roadmap for its execution.

### Scope of Work
The scope of the work includes:

* Providing expertise and services to support FCC’s transformation efforts
* Reviewing and revising FCC’s organizational structure
* Developing a comprehensive roadmap for the transformation process
* Coordinating and executing transformation activities

### Schedule
The timeline for this request for proposal (RFP) is as follows:

* RFP release date: September 8, 2023
* Proponent questions accepted until: September 15, 2023, 2:00 PM CST
* FCC response to proponent questions: September 25, 2023, 5:00 PM CST
* RFP closing date and time: October 3, 2023, 2:00 PM CST

### Evaluation Criteria
Evaluation of submissions will be based on the following criteria:

* Respondent's ability to provide the required services
* Experience and qualifications of the respondent
* Proposed methodology and approach
* Price and value

### Tendering Process
This RFP opportunity is subject to the provisions of Chapter 5 (Government Procurement) of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Chapter 19 (Government Procurement) of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

### Contact Information
For further information or to obtain a copy of the RFP document, please contact Adam Gottselig at procurement@fcc.ca.

### Language
This RFP is available in both English and French. Responses may be submitted in either language.

### Submissions
Submissions must be submitted electronically through MERX, a Canadian electronic public tendering system, by 2:00 PM CST on October 3, 2023. Late submissions will not be accepted. 

### Priority of Documents
In case of any discrepancies between the RFP and the information on the MERX website, the RFP document shall take precedence. Please access the RFP document on http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; See https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information. [End
